Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 2005...
Injured on 7/12/2008 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 6/25/2009 with a Inflamed Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 2-3 weeks...
Injured on 4/8/2011 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Traded from Los Angeles (N) to New York (A) on 5/23/2011 (Going to NYA: CF A. Jackson, 2B K. Wong. Going to LAN: P D. McGowan, 1B M. Carp, LF C. Coghlan)...
Injured on 8/19/2011 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/9/2012, off Jordan Zimmerman (TOR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/27/2012, off Ross Detwiler (TOR)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2012, hitting .254 with 14 HR, 74 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Toronto on 9/7/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/2014, hitting .423 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Cleveland on 9/24/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/2014, hitting .567 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2014, hitting .373 with 9 HR, 29 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/6/2014, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Injured on 7/6/2015 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 3 weeks...
Hit 3 homeruns against Boston, driving in 5 runs on 9/10/2015...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with New York (A) in 2016...
Traded from New York (A) to Oakland on 6/9/2017 (Going to OAK: CF A. Jackson. Going to NYA: CF D. Murphy, 1B A. Heald, C F. Madden Jr.)...
Drove in 7 runs against Texas on 4/15/2019...
Injured on 9/17/2020 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Hit 3 homeruns against Texas, driving in 4 runs on 5/30/2021...
Injured on 7/7/2021 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Championship with Oakland in 2023...
